name: How to become an Engineer
description: How to Become an Engineer is a game about a young student who dreams of becoming an engineer. At the beginning of his journey he starts with the inscription at an university of his choice on a warm and sunny summer day. Full of motivation the young student quickly recognizes that not all things are as they were promoted and a journey begins which the young student never would have imagined. A game full of challenging puzzles, testing your engineering knowledge, funny and partly frustrating jump and run elements mixed with all kinds of mini-games will tell a different story about the life of a young student who may become an engineer one day. This game will give you a new perspective of how a students life may look like.
